* The Hit List
Here's tonight's cocktail menu, courtesy of ChatGPT. ü¶æ

** The Straight Shooter
A bold bourbon cocktail that hits the mark with subtle sweetness and aromatic bitters.

#+BEGIN_EXPORT HTML
<div class="cocktail-recipe">
#+END_EXPORT
- 2 oz bourbon
- 0.5 oz maple syrup
- 2 dashes Angostura bitters
- Orange peel garnish
#+BEGIN_EXPORT HTML
</div>
#+END_EXPORT

** The Hit and Rum
A dangerously smooth rum concoction with a killer combination of flavors.

#+BEGIN_EXPORT HTML
<div class="cocktail-recipe">
#+END_EXPORT
- 2 oz dark rum
- 1 oz fresh lime juice
- 0.75 oz passion fruit syrup
- Splash of ginger beer
- Mint sprig garnish
#+BEGIN_EXPORT HTML
</div>
#+END_EXPORT

** The Dead Drop
A mysterious and dark scotch cocktail with coffee liqueur and chocolate bitters.

#+BEGIN_EXPORT HTML
<div class="cocktail-recipe">
#+END_EXPORT
- 2 oz scotch whisky
- 0.5 oz coffee liqueur (Kahl√∫a)
- 2 dashes chocolate bitters
- Orange twist garnish
#+BEGIN_EXPORT HTML
</div>
#+END_EXPORT

** The Liquid Asset
A gin cocktail with elderflower, lemon, and a splash of soda.

#+BEGIN_EXPORT HTML
<div class="cocktail-recipe">
#+END_EXPORT
- 2 oz gin
- 0.75 oz elderflower liqueur (St-Germain)
- 0.5 oz fresh lemon juice
- Splash of soda water
- Lemon wheel garnish
#+BEGIN_EXPORT HTML
</div>
#+END_EXPORT

** The Molotov Cocktail
An explosive tequila cocktail made with lime, agave, and fiery jalape√±o.

#+BEGIN_EXPORT HTML
<div class="cocktail-recipe">
#+END_EXPORT
- 2 oz tequila (blanco or reposado)
- 1 oz fresh lime juice
- 0.5 oz agave nectar
- 2-3 jalape√±o slices (muddle for heat)
- Taj√≠n rim (optional)
- Lime wheel garnish
#+BEGIN_EXPORT HTML
</div>
#+END_EXPORT
